cmderr.generic: <red>An unexpected error occured, check the console for more information.
cmderr.no-permission: <red>You don't have permission for this command.
cmderr.sender-not-player: <red>This command can only be executed by a player.
warmup.teleport.cancel.player-moved: <red>Teleport was cancelled. Please do not move.
cmd.announce.help.description: Send an announcement message in chat to all players.
cmd.directmessage.help.description: Send a private message to another player.
cmd.directmessage.help.param.target.desc: The player to send the message to.
cmd.reply.help.description: Reply to the last private message you received.
cmd.reply.error.no-reply-target: <red>There is no one to reply to.
cmd.back.help.description: Teleport back to your previous location.
cmd.back.teleported: <gray>You've been teleported back to your previous location.
cmd.tprandom.error.no-teleport-known: <red>Unable to find a random teleport location.
cmd.tprandom.teleported: <gray>You've been teleported to a random location.
cmd.repair.repaired: <gray>The item you're holding has been repaired.
cmd.playerlist.help.description: View a list of all online players.
cmd.tprequest.help.description: Request to teleport to another player.
cmd.tprequest.help.param.target.descript: The player you want to teleport to.
cmd.tprequest.error.too-many-requests: <red>You've already sent this player a request.
cmd.tprequest.requester: <gray>You've send a request to teleport to <green>{0}<gray>.
cmd.tprequest.requestee: <green>{0} <gray>has requested to teleport to you. Type <green>/tpaccept <gray>or <green>/tpdeny<gray>.
cmd.tpaccept.help.param.target.descripti: For which player to accept the teleport request.
cmd.tpaccept.error.no-request-exists: <red>You don't have a teleport request or it has already expired.
cmd.tpaccept.error.no-request-exists-tar: <red>You don't have a teleport request from <dark_red>{0} <red>or it has already expired.
cmd.tpaccept.error.multiple-requests: <red>You have multiple teleport requests, please specify a player.
cmd.tpaccept.requestee: <gray>You have accepted the teleport request of <green>{0}<gray>.
cmd.tpdeny.help.param.target.description: For which player to deny the teleport request.
cmd.tphererequest.help.description: Request another player to teleport to your location.
cmd.tphererequest.help.param.target.desc: The player you're requesting to teleport to you.
cmd.tphererequest.requestee: <green>{0} <gray>has requested you to teleport to them. Type <green>/tpaccept <gray>or <green>/tpdeny<gray>.
cmd.tpcancel.help.param.target.descripti: For which player to cancel the teleport request.
cmd.tpcancel.error.no-request-exists: <red>You don't have a teleport request to <dark_red>{0} <red>or it has already expired.
cmd.tpcancel.error.multiple-requests: <red>You have sent multiple teleport requests, please specify a player.
cmd.tpcancel.requestee: <green>{0} <gray>has cancelled their teleport request to you.
cmd.warp.set.help.description: Set a warp location at your current position.
cmd.warp.set: <gray>Warp <green>{0} <gray>has been set at your current location.
cmd.home.help.description: Teleport to one of your homes.
cmd.home.teleport: <gray>You have been teleported to your home <green>{0}<gray>.
cmd.home.other.help.param.player.descrip: The player whose home to teleport to
cmd.home.set.help.description: Set a home at your current position.
cmd.home.set: <gray>Home <green>{0} <gray>has been set at your current location.
cmd.home.set.max-homes: <red>You have reached the maximum number of homes (<dark_red>{0}<red>).
cmd.home.list.other.help.description: List all homes of another player.
cmd.home.list.other.help.param.player.de: The player whose homes to list
cmd.fly.other.help.description: Toggle fly mode for another player.
cmd.fly.other.help.param.player.descript: The player for whom to toggle fly mode
cmd.flyspeed.error.invalid_speed: <red>Invalid fly speed <dark_red>{0} <red>. Please provide a value between 0 and 100.
cmd.flyspeed.reset: <gray>Your fly speed was reset to default.

cmd.flyspeed.other.help.param.player.des: The player for whom to set the fly speed
